song.englishname: Imagine/Sing The Wondrous Love Of Jesus (Medley)

english.segment1: I can only imagine what it will be like. When I walk by your side. I can only imagine. What my eyes will see. When your face is looking at me
english.segment2: Surrounded by your glory, what will my heart feel?. Will I dance for you Jesus?. When all of youll be still imagine hm.. I can only imagine
english.segment3: I can only imagine all creations bow down. The whole universes saying your name out loud. I can only imagine. All of broken lifes resurrecting in the healing light
english.segment4: Surrounded by your glory, what will my heart feel?. Will I dance for you Jesus?. When all of youll be still. Will I stand in Your presence?. Unto my knees will I fall?. Will I sing hallelujah?. Will I be able to speak it all?. I can only imagine. Oh, I can only imagine
english.segment5: Surrounded by forgiveness, what will my heart feel?. Will I dance for you Jesus?. When all of youll be still. Will I stand in Your presence?. Unto my knees will I fall?. Will I sing hallelujah?. Will I be able to speak it all?. I can only imagine. Oh, I can only imagine. I can only I can only huu.. I can only imagine. I can only Imagine. Just imagine
